title: Group/Project/Org Schema
description: A schema to add regenerative economy Groups, Projects and Organizations to the Murmurations Index

name.title: Group/Project/Org Name
name.description: The full name of the Group/Project/Org

nickname.title: Nickname
nickname.description: The familiar name of the Group/Project/Org

primary_url.title: Primary URL
primary_url.description: The unique and definitive website address for the Group (e.g., my-group.org or some-host.net/my-org)

urls.title: Other URLs
urls.description: URLs for the Group's other websites, social media, etc.

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the Group

mission.title: Mission/Purpose
mission.description: A short statement of why the Group exists and its goals

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the Group

geolocation.title: Geolocation Coordinates
geolocation.description: The geo-coordinates (latitude & longitude) of the primary location of the Group

image.title: Image/Logo
image.description: An image URL (starting with https:// or http://), preferably a square

images.title: Other images
images.description: URLs for other images (starting with https:// or http://)

rss.title: RSS URL
rss.description: A URL (starting with https:// or http://) for the Really Simple Syndication feed for this Group. Usually found at a URL such as https://my-group.org/feed

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Keywords that describe the organization, searchable in the Murmurations index

schema.name: organizations_schema-v1.0.0
schema.purpose: To map Groups, Projects and Organizations within the regenerative economy
